metadataAttributes.Title: Hardware Description Languages for FPGA Design
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course can also be taken for academic credit as ECEA 5361, part of CU Boulder’s Master of Science in Electrical Engineering degree.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Writing Code in Verilog,Simulating FPGA Designs,Designing FPGA Logic,Designing Test Benches,Writing code in VHDL,
